title: kan manam
sahitya:
kan manam uruga sheyyalAgAdA enran kanmavinaiyai tIrkkalAgAdA en


anupallavi

  unmanamum enmanam pOl kallA kattik-katti
uttamanE ettanai vidattil uraittAlum enran


caraNam    mAdaraik-kaNDAl enniru kaNgaLum mIdezhum bAla
 Adavanaik-kaNDa kamalam pOl AgudE
 mAdumai maruvum jagannAthan unnaik-kANavenrAl
 ADavanaik-KaNDa mAlaikkaNpOl kUshudE
mAdarait-toDarndu oru kAdamum pAyndODum anri
  MAdhavaroDun padi valam varak-kurittiladE
mAdhvarai ninaittazhalin mezhugAgudE shrI
  mA dEvan ninnai ninaikkak-kallAi shamaiyudE ik-
